name: get_inventory
description: Retrieves the full list of inventory items, including their details like price and quantity.

name: update_inventory_item
description: Updates the details (price, quantity, name) of a specific inventory item by its ID. Provide only the fields you want to update.

id.description: The unique ID of the inventory item to update.

price.description: The new price of the item.

quantity.description: The new quantity of the item.

name.description: The new name of the item.

name: update_inventory_by_name
description: Updates the details of an inventory item by looking it up by name.

name.description: The name of the item to update (e.g., 'Pizza').

quantity.description: The new quantity of the item.

name: get_low_stock_items
description: Retrieves a list of items that have a quantity of less than 10. Useful for checking what needs restocking.

name: place_order
description: Places a new order for one or more items. Reduces inventory stock accordingly.

items.description: List of items to order. Each item must have an 'id' and 'quantity'.
